nvm arch:
Command: nvm arch [32/64]
Show if node is running in 32 or 64 bit mode.
nvm arch 32: Show if node is running in 32 bit mode.
nvm arch 64: Show if node is running in 64 bit mode.
nvm debug: Check the NVM4W process for known problems (troubleshooter)
nvm install:
Command: nvm install <version> [arch] [--insecure]
Install node
eg: nvm install lts
nvm install lts: Install the lts version of node
nvm install lts --insecure: Bypass SSL validation of the remote download server
nvm install latest: Install the latest version of node
nvm install latest --insecure: Bypass SSL validation of the remote download server
nvm list:
Command: nvm list [available]
List the node.js installations
nvm proxy:
Command: nvm proxy [url]
Set a proxy to use for downloads. Leave [url] blank to see the current proxy
Set [url] to "none" to remove the proxy.
nvm uninstall:
Command: nvm uninstall <version>
The version must be a specific version
nvm use:
Command: nvm use [version] [arch]
Switch to use the specified version.
nvm root:
Command: nvm root [path]
Set the directory where nvm should store different versions of node.js.
If <path> is not set, the current root will be displayed.
nvm version:
Alias : --version/v 
Displays the current running version of nvm for Windows
nvm node_mirror:
Command: nvm node_mirror [url]
Set the node mirror. Defaults to https://nodejs.org/dist/. Leave [url] blank to use default url.
nvm npm_mirror:
Command: nvm npm_mirror [url]
Set the npm mirror. Defaults to https://github.com/npm/cli/archive/. Leave [url] blank to default url.
